text: Looks like i needed to use `html_title` instead in the JSON payload to get it to work. The documentation for those two endpoints didn't reference it though.

Permissions/ add to portal idea.

For users who already have HubSpot accounts and are on multiple portals, it’d be cool to be able to generate a link to send to clients or even internally which would bring up a portal picker(like when you login)

the person chooses the portal to add the person 2, then it goes “hey this user is requesting these permissions - please confirm if these are appropriate”

with a message stating  “you should limit the permissions you give to users to just the things they actually need to be able to access.”
This would help solve the problem of people accidentally not giving developers the permissions they need
